title: Chocolate Cake
ingredients: flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking powder, eggs, butter, milk
instructions: Mix ingredients, bake at 350F for 30 minutes.

title: Caesar Salad
ingredients: romaine lettuce, croutons, parmesan cheese, Caesar dressing
instructions: Toss lettuce, add croutons and parmesan, drizzle dressing.

title: Apple Pie
ingredients: apples, flour, sugar, butter, cinnamon, pie crust
instructions: Place apples in crust, sprinkle with sugar and cinnamon, cover, and bake at 375F for 45 minutes.

title: Pasta Carbonara
ingredients: pasta, eggs, pancetta, parmesan, black pepper
instructions: Cook pasta, fry pancetta, mix with eggs and cheese, combine.
